SEARCH
Module com.example.cab302simplestock
Package com.example.cab302simplestock.model

Class ItemManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.cab302simplestock.model.ItemManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IItemManager
public class ItemManager extends Object implements IItemManager
Implementation of the itemManager interface using a itemDAO for the managing of items. Uses dependency injection to get the item DAO, type and category manager.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ItemManager(IItemDAO itemDAO, ITypeManager typeManager, ICategoryManager categoryManager)
    Constructs an item manager that uses a specified item DAO, type and category manager which are injected.

  • Constructor Details

    • ItemManager

      public ItemManager(IItemDAO itemDAO, ITypeManager typeManager, ICategoryManager categoryManager)
      Constructs an item manager that uses a specified item DAO, type and category manager which are injected.
      Parameters:
      itemDAO - The item DAO to use.
      typeManager - The type manager to use.
      categoryManager - The category manager to use.

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      public int addItem(Item item, String typeName, String categoryName, int groupID)
      Adds a new item to the database for a specific group, takes the name of the items type and category for easier implementation of adding the correct type and category for the item. If the type doesn't exist it is created and added to the database.
      Specified by:
      addItem in interface IItemManager
      Parameters:
      item - The item to add to the database.
      typeName - The name of the type the item is of.
      categoryName - The name of the category the item should be added to.
      groupID - The ID of the group the item should be added to.
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly added item.

    • updateItem

      public void updateItem(Item item)
      CRUD method to update an item in the database The ID value for the item in the database is used to find which item to update.
      Specified by:
      updateItem in interface IItemManager
      Parameters:
      item - The item to update.

    • deleteItem

      public void deleteItem(Item item)
      CRUD method to delete an item in the database The ID value of the item is used to find the item to delete in the database.
      Specified by:
      deleteItem in interface IItemManager
      Parameters:
      item - The item to delete, only needs the values that are used to find which item to delete.

    • getAllItems

      public List<Item> getAllItems()
      Gets all items that exist in the database.
      Specified by:
      getAllItems in interface IItemManager
      Returns:
      A list of all items.

    • findItemByID

      public Item findItemByID(int itemId)
      Searches and finds an item in the database based on the items ID value.
      Specified by:
      findItemByID in interface IItemManager
      Parameters:
      itemId - The ID of the item to search for.
      Returns:
      The item if found.

    • searchItemsByNameInGroup

      public List<Item> searchItemsByNameInGroup(String itemName, int groupID)
      Searches for every item in a category that includes the name or part of the name in the parameter.
      Specified by:
      searchItemsByNameInGroup in interface IItemManager
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name or part of name for the items to search for.
      groupID - The ID of the group the item should be searched in.
      Returns:
      A list of all items with identical or part of the inputted name.
